text: Newbie question re Javis: I’m trying to work through the tutorials but I’m stopped immediately because the compiler can’t find Background or Object (note caps), which clearly are very basic functions (or constructors) used everywhere in the examples. Source is Object.jl for both, which is part of the Javis package. The functions also don’t show up in my online documentation. Anyone know what’s going on? I’m on latest Javis version, 0.3.4. Still on Julia 1.4.
